DOC.brief_summary: The goal study utilize BCTQ ( Boston Carpal Tunnel Questionnaire ) , VAS ( Visual Analog Scale ) , NCS ( Nerve Conduction Study ) , MET ( Multiple Excitability Test ) evaluate compare efficacy Acupuncture Therapy Carbamazepine Patients Carpal Tunnel Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Efficacy Acupuncture Therapy Carbamazepine Oral Dosage Patients With Carpal Tunnel Syndrome Multiple Excitability Test
DOC.criteria: Age great 20 year old outpatient inpatient subject numbness arm , clinically meet diagnostic criterion AAEM ( American association Electrodiagnostic Medicine CTS task force ) , proven distal motor neurological disorder nerve Conduction Study ( distal motor latency > 4.6 msec , decrease SNAP < 12uV prolong median sensory distal latency ( palm wrist ) > 2.5msec ) ã€‚ Willing sign Informed Consent form subject external hand injury disformation subject Polyneuritis Cervical nerve root lesion Subject peripheral hypertrophy , hypothyroidism , multiple myeloma , amyloidosis Allergic Carbamazepine similar type medicine inability act independently , opinion investigator , suitable study In opinion investigator , subject require surgical repair Carpal Tunnel Syndrome , symptoms worsen result irreversible damage subject treat surgical repair within 3 month .
